name: Build the Path
description:
Thank you for trying out "Build the Path".

It's my first finished Game for a GameJam and I gave it my all.

Feel free to leave some Feedback of any kind. 

Left-Click on a block will make it fall, in case the tutorial wasn't clear enough.

And once you switch to your player, you can't go back!

Have Fun!

Credits: Pixel Frog (Tileset for some Parts).
